scripts.build-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && npm run copy-assets && cd cordova && npx cordova build
scripts.build-cordova:android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && npm run copy-assets && cd cordova && npx cordova build android
scripts.cordova:android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && npm run copy-assets && cd cordova && npx cordova run android
scripts.cordova-add:android: cd cordova && npx cordova platform add android
scripts.cordova-rm:android: cd cordova && npx cordova platform rm android
scripts.cordova-watch:android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && npm run copy-assets && cd cordova && npx cordova serve android --live-reload
scripts.cordova-plugin-install: cd cordova && npx cordova plugin add
scripts.cordova-plugin-uninstall: cd cordova && npx cordova plugin remove
scripts.cordova-plugin-list: cd cordova && npx cordova plugin list
